name: Jumpfos in the desert
description:
2d platformer + fighting game Jumpfose in the Desert is a game about a fox named jumpfos, he lives as a scientist in the desert and there is a laboratory in the desert 

He had a tragedy in the laboratory and the monsters escaped to a city called 

Windy city and they wanted to spoil the city but as the main character himself can not cope alone and he will just be helped by a corgi named breeze
